SMB 1 and 2 TPL Format

Notes

  • Sizes for formats are in bits, everything else in bytes
  • Images are formated into blocks, the block size is specific to each format in width by height format:
  • - I4: 8x8
  • - I8: 8x4
  • - IA4: 8x4
  • - IA8: 4x4
  • - RGB565: 4x4
  • - RGB5A3: 4x4
  • - RGBA32: 4x4
  • - C4: 8x8
  • - C8: 8x4
  • - C14X2: 4x4
  • - CMPR: 8x8
  • Blocks are arranged from left to right, top to bottom. If the image doesn't align with the blocks, the extra size will just be represented by null pixels in the block.

Sections

  • File Header
  • Texture Header
  • Texture
  • I4 Format
  • I8 Format
  • IA4 Format
  • IA8 Format
  • RGB565 Format
  • RGB5A3 With Alpha
  • RGB5A3 Without Alpha
  • RGBA32 Format
  • C4/CI4 Format
  • C8/CI8 Format
  • C14X2/CI14X2 Format
  • CMPR Format

Flags

  • Ok to be left as null
  • 4 byte integer
  • 2 byte short
  • 1 byte
  • 1 nibble (1/2 byte)
  • 1 bit
  • 4 byte file offset
  • Unknown

File Header

Length: 0x4/4

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x44Number of images
0x440x00Texture headers (One for each texture)

Texture Header

Length: 0x10/16

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x44Texture format
0x440x44Texture data offset
0x880x22Width of texture
0xA100x22Height of texture
0xC120x22Number of mipmaps
0xE140x220x1234

Texture

Length: 0x20/32

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x2032Texture Block
0x20320x00... Continued blocks till end of texture

I4 Format

Length: 0x4/4

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x44Tone intensity. Times 0x11 for RGB

I8 Format

Length: 0x8/8

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x88Tone intensity

IA4 Format

Length: 0x8/8

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x44Alpha intensity. Times 0x11 for RGBA
0x440x44Tone intensity. Times 0x11 for RGBA

IA8 Format

Length: 0x10/16

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x88Alpha intensity
0x880x88Tone intensity

RGB565 Format

Length: 0x10/16

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x55Red intensity. Times 0x8 for RGB
0x550x66Green intensity. Times 0x4 for RGB
0xB110x55Blue intensity. Times 0x8 for RGB

RGB5A3 With Alpha

Length: 0x10/16

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x11Alpha bit, set to 1
0x110x33Alpha intensity. Times 0x20 for RGBA
0x440x44Red intensity. Times 0x11 for RGBA
0x880x44Green intensity. Times 0x11 for RGBA
0xC120x44Blue intensity. Times 0x11 for RGBA

RGB5A3 Without Alpha

Length: 0x10/16

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x11Alpha bit, set to 0
0x110x55Red intensity. Times 0x8 for RGB
0x660x55Green intensity. Times 0x8 for RGB
0xB110x55Blue intensity. Times 0x8 for RGB

RGBA32 Format

Length: 0x20/32

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x88Alpha intensity
0x880x88Red intensity
0x10160x00... Repeat above 2 for half the block
0x10160x88Green intensity
0x18240x88Blue intensity
0x20320x00... Repeat above 2 for second half of the block

C4/CI4 Format

Length: 0x4/4

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x44Palette index

C8/CI8 Format

Length: 0x8/8

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x88Palette index

C14X2/CI14X2 Format

Length: 0xE/14

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x22Ignored
0x220xC12Palette index

CMPR Format

Length: 0xA0/160

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x1016First RGB565 color
0x10160x1016Second RGB 565 color
0x20320x22pixel index into palette
0x22340x7E126... 63 more indices
